TitleEnglish: Doraemons: The Puzzling Challenge Letter of the Mysterious Thief Dorapan
SummaryEnglish: The Doraemons recieve a letter from Principal Terodai. But in reality, it's a challenge letter from the mysterious thief Dorapan. With 5 of them turned to stone, do you think Doramed and Dorarinho will kill Dorapan? Find out on this adventure.
